input.sentences: it was time to take the kids to organization .
they met lots of neat characters .
output.sentences: You have to be organized to have time for kids.
The little boy thought it was neat to have met with the bear and had lots of giggles because of it.
We all ate lots of food at the park.
From the park we could see the Matterhorn.
The souvenirs were fun in the evening when they lit up.
